name: Mayhem Survivors: Animals
description:
Animals have gone crazy. Feed them all to survive the Mayhem! Choose your food and items carefully, try out unique builds each run.

Features

  • Manual or Auto Attacks.
  • 23+ Weapons
  • 55+ Items
  • 250+ Upgrade choices
  • Fast Paced Gameplay
  • Difficulty Options
  • Choose between challenging mods or casual mods

Game Modes


  • Classic Mode(Fast Pace): Fight againts hordes of animals, Collect gems to level up, Upgrade your character and survive for 15 Minutes.
  • Mayhem Mode(Fast Pace): Enemies get stronger each wave, Open a mysterious box to get a random item or a weapon to upgrade your character. Survive for 15 Waves or try to stay alive as long as you can. Feed all the animals to advance through the next round.
  • Survival Mode(Moderate Pace): Survive for a certain time each round. Buy upgrade from the shop with gold obtained from animals fed. Each run takes 15-20 Minutes.
